############################################################################################################
###############################       DO NOT MANUALLY EDIT THIS FILE    ####################################
############################################################################################################

############################################################################################################
##################  THIS FILE GENERATED BY PYTHON SCRIPT MEC_Expeditions_Writer.py  ########################
############################################################################################################

# Provinces are eligible expedition targets if neither you nor your subjects own them, and you don't have a truce or alliance with the owner.
MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = {
	AND = {
		NOT = {
			country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
		}
		NOT = {
			owner = {
				ROOT = {
					truce_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			owner = {
				overlord_of = ROOT
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			owner = {
				OR = {
					alliance_with = ROOT
					overlord = {
						alliance_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_british_isles_trigger = { # the British Isles Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.british_isles = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_northern_europe_trigger = { # Northern Europe Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.northern_europe = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea

MEC_Expeditions_available_france_trigger = { # France Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.france = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar

						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa

						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {

				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {

						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea

						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea

						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula

						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
		}

MEC_Expeditions_available_iberia_trigger = { # Iberia Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.iberia = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan

						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia

			}

				dip_tech = 31

					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone

				}

					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa

						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29

					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean

						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo

				}

				dip_tech = 25

					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node

						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_iberian_islands_trigger = { # the Iberian Islands Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.iberian_islands = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_northwest_africa_trigger = { # Northwest Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.northwest_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_west_africa_trigger = { # West Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.west_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_gulf_of_guinea_trigger = { # the Gulf of Guinea Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.gulf_of_guinea = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_central_africa_trigger = { # Central Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.central_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_south_africa_trigger = { # South Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.south_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_east_africa_trigger = { # East Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.east_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_indian_ocean_trigger = { # the Indian Ocean Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.indian_ocean = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_arabia_trigger = { # Arabia Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.arabia = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_western_india_trigger = { # Western India Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.western_india = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_southern_india_trigger = { # Southern India Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.southern_india = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_eastern_india_trigger = { # Eastern India Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.eastern_india = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_malacca_trigger = { # Malacca Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.malacca = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Canada
						province_group = tradenode_8 # American West Coast
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # West Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_84 # East Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_82 # South Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_83 # North Atlantis Node
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_73 # West Mediterranean
						province_group = tradenode_74 # France
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_81 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Barbary Coast
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Levant
						province_group = tradenode_69 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Danube
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Baltic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Crimea
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Dnieper
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Niger River
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Guiana
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_41 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Lower Nile
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Arabia
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Yettishar
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Deccan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Far East
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Delhi
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Himalayan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Huazhong
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 16
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_6 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Zhongyuan
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_southeast_asia_trigger = { # Southeast Asia Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.southeast_asia = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Andes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Panama
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Plains
